p: Herbs and spices offer a wide range of flavors that increase sensory variety in food and beverages without additional energy [ 4] while providing health benefits, due mainly to their antioxidant properties [ 5]. Several spices are dietary agents with anticancer properties due to containing compounds like curcumin, gingerol, anethole, or zerumbone, which are powerful inhibitors of nuclear factor κB (NF-κB), protein complex involved in DNA transcription [ 6].
